turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like a drink from Peets please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, which location should I order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 60 Washington Square S, New York, NY

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect. What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What would you recommend?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I recently had the golden caffe latte and loved it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok. Perfect. What's in that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It's a regular caffe latte with turmeric, honey, and ginger

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ooh that sounds great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Skim please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok great. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that's it

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok perfect.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually can you add an extra shot of espresso?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How much is that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The extra shot is an extra dollar.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Just add it to my account there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. The order is confirmed and you will get a receipt sent to your phone.
